entry.title: Rust Meetup #12
entry.content:
Rust Basel Meetup #11 â€“

Our 12th on-site meetup, generously sponsored by E+H Digital Solutions.

ğŸ¤ The Talk

  • Silen Locatelli Your first Rust CLI project

ğŸ§ƒ Community + Snacks

We had a diverse group of attendants on a very hot day. Discussions included project architecture, dependency bloat, and even a bit about the Zig programming language and Tigerbeetle, a double entry financial transaction database. After the talk we enjoyed Pizza from Vito, and the beautiful weather by the Rhein

We were at a new venue this time in khaus on a very warm day

entry.title: Rust Meetup #11
entry.content:
Rust Basel Meetup #11 â€“

Our 11th on-site meetup, generously sponsored by [letsboot.ch] and by E+H Digital Solutions. was held at the Letsboot offices

ğŸ¤ The Talk

  • Jan Cristina Diplomat: a tool for generating polyglot bindings to Rust code:slides

ğŸ§ƒ Community + Snacks

There was a lot of discussion about different ways of getting rust code into non-rust code-bases. Definitely a more advanced topic, but there was a lot of interest as rust makes it easier to connect to other language ecosystems.

ğŸ—ºï¸ Logistics Recap

The meetup was hosted at Letsboot, in Aeschenplatz

ğŸ§¡ Thank You!

  • Letsboot â€“ for the lovely venue.
  • E+H Digital Solutions â€“ for keeping us fed.

  • Or just drop by the next meetup and say hi!
